title: Akaliza: A woman taking over the world  | Umutesidoreen's Blog

quotes: I moved to Rwanda for the first time in January 2009 after having lived in eight different cities around the world and visiting over 15 others by the time I was graduating from university.
This year I plan to start creating animated films and series targeting Rwandan children.
I have a fantastic team which I am hoping to expand this year, by God’s grace.
I’ve improved a lot over the last three years, but I still have a long way to go… buhoro buhoro (slowly, slowly).

organizations.name: Shaking Sun
quotes: Shaking Sun is a multimedia company that offers a range of services including website development, graphic design and animation.

organizations.name: Government
quotes: There are a lot of opportunities in the ICT sector in Rwanda. Not only is there a lot of promotion from the Government, but in Rwanda you have the incredible opportunity to be the first to do something.

roles.title: entrepreneur
quotes: My name is Akaliza Gara and I am a 25 year old Rwandan entrepreneur.
I moved to Rwanda for the first time in January 2009 after having lived in eight different cities around the world and visiting over 15 others by the time I was graduating from university.

There are a lot of opportunities in the ICT sector in Rwanda. Not only is there a lot of promotion from the Government, but in Rwanda you have the incredible opportunity to be the first to do something. You could be the first Rwanda, to develop a Blackberry app or the first Rwandan to design a laptop.
